html:
8.21.18  9:07 am   when i try to organize what i mean to say in a structured, presentable way, i just end up cutting out the meaning.

      it's hard to tell what the core of importance is when trying to shuffle everything around until it reads like something that 'makes sense'. or maybe it's that when i feel the pressure to do this, i didn't get a chance to decide what i mean, it was imposed on me either by some Authority or my own self thinking it's absolutely necessary. then it's a fight to figure out what makes sense, what makes sense to me, what's going to make sense to whoever's going to see it, and that's hard to tease out especially with a real or even imagined deadline. i get caught up in teasing it up all nice, and it might carry some of the right meaning, but it's severely watered down or the real big points are underdeveloped in favor of presentability. and it's not exactly that i'm consciously trying to make it fake. it's endlessly second-guessing what's strong and what's not when i can delete and rephrase as much as i want. the reason rambling beginning-to-end with no edits works is because it's just everything that goes through my head, which is as real and close to my thoughts as anything...becuase... you know, they're my thoughts. how did that not occur to me? i can't believe myself. well. at least i know now.

rumor has it that i'm a rotten person and everyone knows it.

     hmm. that's quite a jump. well it's not if you show the thread of thought that connected those things. which i forgot to do because i was busy thinking. or i was thinking about that before. or the parts that would make that make sense somehow fell through the filter. i don't know. i don't know i don't know asdfasdf dfjkdfjkdjfkdfj there's been no editing of this. it's beginning to end. it's not . that. bad. i.dont.know.anymore.


why?              do i                                        


focus. fucking focus fucking focus. what is your point? what is the point? what are you feeling? are you just stuck on the words that you're typing? is that taking over your mind in favor of what you're trying to actually get across?    and why do you have to do it here? why?            do you                    ?           do this?        i don't like that i do this. why not?         because i do it wrong a lot. & nbsp;&nb sp;   what's wrong?         being fucking embarrassingly awful and terrible and maybe even gross.        okay.      you do it right sometimes? yes. i guess.      okay. what is the difference between a time you did it 'right' and a time you did it 'wrong'?         i forgot to have a point. i just talked to talked. i had feelings, sure, but being caught up in OMFG THIS HAS TO GET DONE AND IT HAS TO GET DONE RIGHT ruins it.      


you know what a big part of this is? this is how they teach you to write in school, conveying information in the standard, structured way.

      it can work if you're trying to convey plain information, and maybe you can learn to do it up all nice so it's not Boring As Fuck, but when you're writing what's on your mind the points are what's on your mind. and editing what's on your mind is editing out the actual meaning of those thoughts and feelings.

     how did that not occur to me?


okay. i think i'm getting somewhere. i think. but what else? you forgot the part where you felt hurt.       i felt hurt because i made and continue to make people uncomfortable when i be myself and i try to be better but i can't figure out how to BE because i am not a good be-er in the first place

     which makes it hard to figure out how to adjust your be-settings.

what is be? well be is me. i guess. and what don't you like about you?     that i'm so self-absorbed that it blinds me from seeing when i'm being ridiculous and broadcasting my ridiculousness      and it's not that i'm all bad but i'm pretty bad           why do you have to be so mean to yourself?           because that's what i was taught to do.          i guess.      if you could forgive yourself, do you think you could find the strength to be as good as you can be and improve?

     i just don't understand. i don't know anymore.     this is supposed to be fun. it's been fun    but lately i've forgotten about having fun. for the most part i did a long time ago.     this is as close as i get to that.       and    i just don't want to let go of it.        because then i'll have nothing.        and i did have nothing for a while.       why. why why why why why why. why. why. why. why. why. why. why. why. why. bother. why. bother. why do you have to bother people.

     but i have to try a little harder than this, right?

     how do i be clear without being fucking bonkers? there's a lot of circumstances where that's not going to work.

     okay, here's my point :: i am sorry for any discomfort that i may have caused. i'm trying to try in the right way but i'm not exactly good at that.

      i want people to feel better for having interacted with me. i'm not good at that. i'm trying to learn how to do that.      i guess that's it. i guess, outside of having fun. i'm trying to figure out how to be a human.

      this is probably far from the best way of doing that, but if it wasn't already clear, i am a severely confused person who just doesn't understand that sort of thing.    but i desperately want to know how to not suck

      it's hard to tell what the core of importance is when trying to shuffle everything around until it reads like something that 'makes sense'. or maybe it's that when i feel the pressure to do this, i didn't get a chance to decide what i mean, it was imposed on me either by some Authority or my own self thinking it's absolutely necessary. then it's a fight to figure out what makes sense, what makes sense to me, what's going to make sense to whoever's going to see it, and that's hard to tease out especially with a real or even imagined deadline. i get caught up in teasing it up all nice, and it might carry some of the right meaning, but it's severely watered down or the real big points are underdeveloped in favor of presentability. and it's not exactly that i'm consciously trying to make it fake. it's endlessly second-guessing what's strong and what's not when i can delete and rephrase as much as i want. the reason rambling beginning-to-end with no edits works is because it's just everything that goes through my head, which is as real and close to my thoughts as anything...becuase... you know, they're my thoughts. how did that not occur to me? i can't believe myself. well. at least i know now.

rumor has it that i'm a rotten person and everyone knows it.

     hmm. that's quite a jump. well it's not if you show the thread of thought that connected those things. which i forgot to do because i was busy thinking. or i was thinking about that before. or the parts that would make that make sense somehow fell through the filter. i don't know. i don't know i don't know asdfasdf dfjkdfjkdjfkdfj there's been no editing of this. it's beginning to end. it's not . that. bad. i.dont.know.anymore.


why?              do i                                        


focus. fucking focus fucking focus. what is your point? what is the point? what are you feeling? are you just stuck on the words that you're typing? is that taking over your mind in favor of what you're trying to actually get across?    and why do you have to do it here? why?            do you                    ?           do this?        i don't like that i do this. why not?         because i do it wrong a lot. & nbsp;&nb sp;   what's wrong?         being fucking embarrassingly awful and terrible and maybe even gross.        okay.      you do it right sometimes? yes. i guess.      okay. what is the difference between a time you did it 'right' and a time you did it 'wrong'?         i forgot to have a point. i just talked to talked. i had feelings, sure, but being caught up in OMFG THIS HAS TO GET DONE AND IT HAS TO GET DONE RIGHT ruins it.      


you know what a big part of this is? this is how they teach you to write in school, conveying information in the standard, structured way.

      it can work if you're trying to convey plain information, and maybe you can learn to do it up all nice so it's not Boring As Fuck, but when you're writing what's on your mind the points are what's on your mind. and editing what's on your mind is editing out the actual meaning of those thoughts and feelings.

     how did that not occur to me?


okay. i think i'm getting somewhere. i think. but what else? you forgot the part where you felt hurt.       i felt hurt because i made and continue to make people uncomfortable when i be myself and i try to be better but i can't figure out how to BE because i am not a good be-er in the first place

     which makes it hard to figure out how to adjust your be-settings.

what is be? well be is me. i guess. and what don't you like about you?     that i'm so self-absorbed that it blinds me from seeing when i'm being ridiculous and broadcasting my ridiculousness      and it's not that i'm all bad but i'm pretty bad           why do you have to be so mean to yourself?           because that's what i was taught to do.          i guess.      if you could forgive yourself, do you think you could find the strength to be as good as you can be and improve?

     i just don't understand. i don't know anymore.     this is supposed to be fun. it's been fun    but lately i've forgotten about having fun. for the most part i did a long time ago.     this is as close as i get to that.       and    i just don't want to let go of it.        because then i'll have nothing.        and i did have nothing for a while.       why. why why why why why why. why. why. why. why. why. why. why. why. why. bother. why. bother. why do you have to bother people.

     but i have to try a little harder than this, right?

     how do i be clear without being fucking bonkers? there's a lot of circumstances where that's not going to work.

     okay, here's my point :: i am sorry for any discomfort that i may have caused. i'm trying to try in the right way but i'm not exactly good at that.

      i want people to feel better for having interacted with me. i'm not good at that. i'm trying to learn how to do that.      i guess that's it. i guess, outside of having fun. i'm trying to figure out how to be a human.

      this is probably far from the best way of doing that, but if it wasn't already clear, i am a severely confused person who just doesn't understand that sort of thing.    but i desperately want to know how to not suck
